sentences.sentence: These grains may parch, but they will not pop.
sentences.translation: 这些谷物能够烤，但他们不能爆。

sentences.sentence: No heat, no drought can parch that river, "the streams whereof make glad the city of God."
sentences.translation: 没有热，没有旱能叫那道“使神的城欢喜”(诗四十六篇四节)的河干涸。

sentences.sentence: A virus disease of sugar beet occurred in Ningxia showing symptoms of yellows, parch blight and necrotic yellow vein of foliage leaves.
sentences.translation: 发生在宁夏甜菜上的一种病毒病的病株叶丛主要表现为黄化、焦桔和叶脉黄化坏死。
